description: The Nano-Air® Light Hybrid Jacket is made for cool-weather objectives where you’re working hard. With 40-g FullRange® insulation, a flyweight shell and lining fabric and R1® Air knit paneling for warm, stretchy, exceptionally breathable performance for high-exertion activities.
name: Patagonia Nano-Air Light Hybrid Jacket - Mens

specs.value: 1.6-oz 30-denier 100% recycled polyester air permeable shadow ripstop with four-way stretch and a PFC-free DWR finish (durable water repellent coating that does not contain perfluorinated chemicals)
5.7-oz 100% recycled polyester jacquard fleece with hollow-core yarns
